↳ Cafe Hunter San Francisco on Instagram: ".
[Cafe Hunter travels to Japan 🇯🇵]

Yes me trying a viral coffee shop in Tokyo with their 2D and 3D latte art! And this coffee shop is Hat Coffee, nestled in a residential area in Asakusa. I was ecstatic to have them make me a 3D Pikachu! 😍

A line was expected but there’s an attentive staff asking if you want dine-in or take out. Be prepared to present photos of the art you want, I had to Google a photo on the spot. They have very limited art choices so it’s better to have your own photo for a more personalized experience.

It’s fun to see the amazement of other customers’ reactions to their coffee because it builds up when it’s my turn.

Coffee was okay but the main point is the latte art. It’s worth the wait because the key point of the experience are the latte artists’ expertise who tirelessly do one drink after another. They’re so passionate on each cup and I was extremely happy when I got my 3D Pikachu! It wiggles so much! 😍
.
💎 Have you been here before? Follow and tag @cafehunter.sf and tell me all about it! 🤗
.
